product_name: Pat's Backcountry Beverages eco2 Activator - Package of 12
long_description: Enjoy effervescent refreshment wherever you roam! Each pouch of Pat's Backcountry Beverages eco2 Activator carbonates a 16 fl. oz. beverage when used with the Carbonator bottle (sold separately).
short_description: Enjoy effervescent refreshment wherever you roam! Each pouch of Pat's Backcountry Beverages eco2 Activator carbonates a 16 fl. oz. beverage when used with the Carbonator bottle (sold separately).
